smarterAppMetadata.Subject: ELA
smarterAppMetadata.SufficientEvidenceOfClaim: (Organization) The student will revise informational/explanatory text by identifying improved organizational elements such as: Providing a conclusion that follows from and supports the information or explanation presented (e.g., articulating implications or the significance of a topic).
smarterAppMetadata.EvidenceStatement: (Organization) The student will revise informational/explanatory text by identifying improved organizational elements such as: Providing a conclusion that follows from and supports the information or explanation presented (e.g., articulating implications or the significance of a topic).
